content: Or it could be that what’s being said makes a difference. Women may ask more questions to uncover the prospect’s pain, or may verbally empathize more, or may build better rapport. Hard to measure those with this data. Then again, it could be just the fact that they’re not throwing around Nerf toys that causes them to sell more … because they’re more attentive and focused on the customer rather than trying to hit Roger in the next cubicle in the face with a Nerf football.
